name: Nightmare Weaver
text: You can use your ability to create magical darkness to terrorize enemies.
prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, Nightmare Fist, Intimidate 2 ranks, ability to cast darkness.
benefit: By spending a full-round action to cast darkness, you can also make Intimidate checks to demoralize all foes in the spell’s initial area.
special: This feat counts as Dazzling Display for purposes of qualifying for Deadly Stroke and Shatter Defenses.
staminaText: When you cast darkness as a standard action, you can spend 5 stamina points to also attempt Intimidate checks to demoralize all foes in the spell’s initial area.
text_zh: 你可以使用你创造魔法黑暗的能力来让敌人陷入恐惧。
prerequisites_zh: 精通徒手打击，夜魇之拳，威吓2级，创造魔法黑暗的能力。
benefit_zh: 通过花费整轮动作来施放‘黑暗术’，你可以同时对影响范围内的所有敌人进行一次威吓检定。
special_zh: 该专长在获取“致死打击（Deadly Stroke）”和“粉碎防御（Shatter Defenses）”专长时，可以替代“炫目技巧”作为先决条件。
staminaText_zh: 当你以一个标准动作施放黑暗术时，你可以消耗5点耐力来尝试对法术初始范围内的所有敌人进行一次挫败士气的威吓检定。
